content.value:
Look, I believe in academic education

I wouldn't be finishing my 2nd degree if I didn't

But there is NOTHING I've learned in C.S. that I couldn't have learned outside the university

And there are LOTS of career-relevant things I could never have learned in university
content.html: Look, I believe in academic education I wouldn't be finishing my 2nd degree if I didn't But there is NOTHING I've learned in C.S. that I couldn't have learned outside the university And there are LOTS of career-relevant things I could never have learned in university
